headline.main: CALLAGHAN PRAISED BY BATTLE COMRADES; Survivors of Solomons Fight Pay Tribute to Slain Admiral

lead_paragraph: WITH THE UNITED STATES FLEET in the South Pacific, Nov. 16 (Delayed) (U.P.) -- Navy men who lived through the great battle of the Solomon Islands paid tribute today to "Uncle Dan" Callaghan and others of their mates who did not live.
abstract: Rear Adm D J Callaghan lauded in memorial service aboard cruiser San Francisco
snippet: WITH THE UNITED STATES FLEET in the South Pacific, Nov. 16 (Delayed) (U.P.) -- Navy men who lived through the great battle of the Solomon Islands paid tribute today to "Uncle Dan" Callaghan and others of their mates who did not live....
